alert.note: Alert for Banner; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:59PM CDT until July 08 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... West central Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bayard, or 14 miles southeast of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bayard, Minatare, Chimney Rock State Park, Moomaws Corner, South Bayard Junction, Melbeta and McGrew. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
